title: FIRST ALERT TRAFFIC: Fog increases in Livingston and Ascension parishes, drive safely
content:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) - 

If viewing this story on a mobile device or in an email, click the link for additional traffic features - http://shout.lt/bcZ1v

7:10 a.m. - The fog has increased in Livingston and Ascension parishes. I-12 through Denham Springs is especially foggy. Drive with caution.

6:10 a.m. - There are areas of dense fog on I-10 in Ascension Parish. Drive carefully and remember to use low beam headlights.

5:55 a.m. - Emergency crews are on the scene of a crash with injury on I-10 East past the I-10/I-12 Split. The crash is on the right shoulder.
